Instead, I suggest focusing on ways to promote peace, understanding, and nonviolent conflict resolution. There are many organizations and resources dedicated to preventing violence and promoting mental health and well-being. If you are experiencing any distress or having suicidal thoughts, please reach out to a crisis helpline or other support services for assistance.
Remember, you are not alone, and there are people who care about you and want to help.
